resources.string: There are no data to analyze and compare yet
Log at least 2 periods to get personalized insights about your previous cycle and period length
Log at least 3 periods to get insights about your cycle regularity
Dates are auto-filled. Tap them to adjust.

Waiting for your period and puzzled if what you\'re feeling is pregnancy signs or just PMS? Not sure how and when to do a pregnancy test? Wondering if your birth control has you covered or you need a backup plan? Freaking out about getting pregnant so much you\'d rather avoid sex at all? Read on to get the answers!

Waiting for your period and puzzled if what you\'re feeling is pregnancy signs or just PMS? Not sure how and when to do a pregnancy test? Wondering if your birth control has you covered or you need a backup plan? Freaking out about getting pregnant so much you\'d rather avoid sex at all? Read on to get the answers!
The prediction is based on the last period\n you logged
In the latter part of your period, progesterone is low but estrogen starts rising, which may give energy levels a boost
You may experience a surge in estrogen-based energy and productivity, though there is a risk of overdoing things
Your progesterone and estrogen levels are low but stable - though you may lack energy, your mood should feel steady
After ovulation, estrogen falls and progesterone rises, so you may feel calmer, but lacking energy
In the latter part of your period, progesterone is low but estrogen starts rising, which may give energy levels a boost
After ovulation, estrogen falls and progesterone rises, so you may feel calmer, but lacking energy
After ovulation, estrogen falls and progesterone rises, so you may feel calmer, but lacking energy
After ovulation, estrogen falls and progesterone rises, so you may feel calmer, but lacking energy
With estrogen and progesterone up, your sense of direction and coordination are up in the luteal phase, but you may experience oilyskin
With estrogen and progesterone up, your sense of direction and coordination are up in the luteal phase, but you may experience oilyskin
At the end of the luteal phase, with rising estrogen and progesterone, you may have all the feels, but stress can be a big one Today
With estrogen and progesterone up, your sense of direction and coordination are up in the luteal phase, but you may experience oilyskin
With estrogen and progesterone up, your sense of direction and coordination are up in the luteal phase, but you may experience oilyskin
With estrogen and progesterone up, your sense of direction and coordination are up in the luteal phase, but you may experience oilyskin
With estrogen and progesterone up, your sense of direction and coordination are up in the luteal phase, but you may experience oilyskin
As estrogen rises, your body may shift from finite glycogen (carbohydrates) to fat as an energy source - now\'s the time to wow your family or friends with a dinner or cocktail party
Rising levels of estrogen may improve working memory - used during reasoning, learning, and comprehension-based activities. This is a good day for learning a couple of new words
Though you may be enjoying increased energy and reward-based motivation due to rising estrogen levels, try to pace yourself. Take a time-out with a mind-clearing walk outdoors
Estrogen is linked with hearing, and rising levels at this time may cause increased audio sensitivity. Be mindful if you\'re going to loud places like concerts or nightclubs
Breast tenderness, caused by pre-period hormonal drop, has eased, making going for a walk, swimming, or cycling more pleasant
If you\'ve been suffering from bloating or diarrhea, these symptoms should ease up now that prostaglandin activity (a key trigger) is in decline. Celebrate with some tasty takeout
Progesterone is linked to sleep, so low levels may mean you find it harder to fall asleep. Stop screen use an hour before bed and try a simple meditation
Although estrogen is rising, it\'s still relatively low, restricting production of serotonin (AKA the happy hormone). Try a positive, mindful activity like gratitude journaling
With hormones low but stable, this is a comparatively calmer time, so you may feel more able to concentrate. This is a good time to return to more complex work projects
With symptoms from bleeding to cramping still going on and low estrogen affecting energy levels, try activities that help you rest and relax, such as mindful meditation
Low estrogen levels can affect the skin, resulting in excessive sebum production that blocks pores and causes breakouts. Try a deep cleansing treatment like a charcoal face mask
You may still be experiencing cramps and back pain due to the release of prostaglandins. Try a simple yoga pose, such as child\'s pose or seated cat-cow
Due to falling progesterone and estrogen, the late luteal phase is linked to higher perceptual speed when comparing/scanning figures today\'s the day to crush that spreadsheet
As levels of estrogen and progesterone decline, you may find verbal fluency increases, making you more articulate. Channel this into creative writing or blogging
Before your period, you may experience cramps caused by prostaglandins, which make the muscles in the uterus contract. Putting a heat pad on your stomach can help
Spatial navigation improves due to declining estrogen and progesterone levels, meaning you may find map-reading and orientation easier. A good day to go for a hike somewhere new
Though progesterone is falling, relatively high levels are linked to emotional perceptiveness. Tackle relationship conflicts while you\'re in your prime
As progesterone falls, you may experience bloating, which can impact digestion. Try to avoid salty foods and stay hydrated
Fluctuations in estrogen and progesterone may trigger breast pain, so it may be a good day to opt for looser, more comfortable tops (though a supportive bra is a must)
Due to rising estrogen, emotional awareness and sensitivity to others\' reactions may increase, especially sadness. Reach out to loved ones who may be in need
Increased understanding of negative emotions is linked to the luteal phase, so this could be a good day to tackle thorny conversations with colleagues or managers
High progesterone is linked to sebum production, so your skin may look greasier. Use a cleansing brush at night to deep clean your skin before using a light moisturizer
High levels of progesterone can increase amygdala reactivity in the brain, which can trigger feelings of stress. Try a guided meditation before bed to help you let go of any worries
Increased progesterone boosts spatial navigation, meaning you may find it easier to navigate journeys. Volunteer to helm a road trip with friends
As estrogen and progesterone rise, you may find your fine motor coordination improves, making this the perfect time for a dance class
As progesterone rises, basal body temperature increases, so you may sweat more. Opt for lighter clothing options in natural fibers to feel more comfortable
Estrogen is linked to water retention, which can cause swollen fingers and puffy ankles - as it falls, you may find swelling eases off. You can safely wear your favorite heels or sandals
Falling estrogen levels may be linked to greater emotional awareness and sensitivity in terms of perceiving others\' reactions and feelings a good day to help those in need
Rising levels of progesterone have been linked to increased appetite and the desire for sugar and fat-rich foods. Try to fill up on healthy veggies with a big salad
Estrogen - linked to more efficient energy metabolism - is falling, so you may find you are fatigued sooner. Opt for moderate exercise like a shorter-than-normal jog
